attributes.action: Fees concession for self-finance students due to the closure of universities.
attributes.additional_details:
Because this will help the self-finance students financially and emotionally in this economically stressing time. The other reason is that due to the closure of universities and self-isolation the face to face teaching and accessing other universities facilities are totally un-accessible which effecting self-finance students mental health and also financially. We need your kind help to raise this issue in the parliament to help self-finance student.
Thank you for understanding.
attributes.background: During this drastic measure and self-isolation the universities are closed and students can’t access all the universities facilities or Face to face teaching. So I will request the honourable parliament if the self-financed and international students get some fees confession it will be very helpful.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304855

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
